settings.label: Image
settings.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.

settings.label: Checkout icon
settings.info: Enter the name of any free solid icons on [FontAwesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&s=solid&m=free)

settings.content: 1. Click on the button below: Theme actions > Edit code
2. Copy & paste your Review Widget code in this file: review-widget.liquid
3. Copy & paste your Review Badge code in this file: review-badge.liquid

** If your Review App has done an auto-install of the review widget, you will have to delete it manually. You will find their auto-installed review widget at the bottom of one of these 2 files: product.liquid or product-template.liquid

settings.label: Enable
settings.info: Enable your store to sell in multiple currencies. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup).

settings.label: IP geolocalisation
settings.info: Display currency based on the location of your customer.

settings.label: Prefix
settings.default: Your cart is saved for the next

settings.label: Goal amount
settings.info: Set up your free [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping) matching the amount entered above

settings.label: Goal reached
settings.default: You are eligible for FREE shipping!

settings.label: Icon
settings.info: Enter the name of any free solid icons on [FontAwesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&s=solid&m=free)

settings.content: 1. At the bottom, click on Theme actions > Edit code
2. On the left side, click the Assets heading to reveal your Assets content.
3. Under the Assets heading, click the Add a new asset link:
* If you have a color called 'Déjà Vu Blue', then name your image deja-vu-blue.jpg
* If your color is 'Blue/Gray', then name your image blue-gray.jpg
* If your color is 'Black', then name your image black.jpg

settings.label: Activate
settings.info: To show collections, articles and pages, uncheck the "Only search products" checkbox in the Cart/Search theme settings

If a gift card product image is not available the global image will serve as a first fallback then the default image as the final fallback. Note that the gift card product image will not display in the Theme customizer. To preview this, you will need to perform a test sale for a gift card product and preview it from the link in the email generated
For best results use an image with a 5:3 aspect ratio
